issue.title: [CF 554] It would be nice to show how many Holy Power I have (counter)
issue.body:
Using r559.

Is there a way to make it display how many Holy Power I have?

I currently have a dealie to make it show when I have more than 2 (so 3, 4 or 5), but it won't tell me how many I actually have on the icon.

I have looked through the DogTags help stuff and cannot find anything that applies.  Combo points don't work, and holy power doesn't seem to be any kind of resource I know how to make DT understand.

Thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user theondry | Imported from CurseForge issue #554 | Raw

comments.body:
I will add a HolyPower tag to DogTag when I get a chance. In the mean time, there isn't a way to display this on an icon.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Well, it actually looks like there already is one. It is just labeled and documented extremely poorly.

[AltP(unit="player", index=9)] should do the trick.

Edited Aug 29, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I thought that would be the relevant tag, but couldn't find anything about indicies. Thanks.

Where are the docs for Dogtags? Every time I look for them I get stuff about military dogtags. :)


> Posted by CurseForge user theondry

Type '/dt' '/dogtags' in-game. This is the only documentation available that I am aware of. I hope to update it a bit when I get some spare time. Conditions for holy power and other special resources will definitely be the first thing I do.

List of possible indices is here: http://www.wowpedia.org/PowerType


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
